<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This project is a Python package for PyPI, using uv for packaging and publishing. It provides pandas DataFrame templates for REDCap instruments, with stacking and upload functionality, and includes tests for REDCap compatibility.
